<script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(document).ready(function () {

        jQuery.la.authentification.initForm();
        jQuery('#openSearchModal, #openSearchModal2').click(function () {
            jQuery('body').removeClass('opened_burger_menu');
            jQuery('#mySearch').load('/Concours-et-cadeaux/search/modal?site=replay' + ' #search_form', function () {
                               jQuery("#search_form form").attr("action", '//replay.gulli.fr/search');
                jQuery.la.autocompletion.init('replaySearch[searchText]');
            });
        });
    });
